text: Tumhi sanga, kaya mi tumhala yahuna uttama asi gosta sangu allahace bhaya rakhanarya lokankarita, tyancya palanakartyajavala jannati aheta jyancya khali pravaha vahata aheta. Jyata te nehami nehami rahatila, ani paka sapha (svaccha-sud'dha) patn'ya ani sarvasrestha allahaci prasannata ahe ani sarvacya sarva dasa allahacya najareta aheta
